name: washing_start
description: This function is used to start a washing cycle in a specified compartment of the washing machine.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to have its washing cycle started.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to have its washing cycle started.
